dc.title: Welcome to the ASTER Spectral Library
dc.description: The ASTER spectral library includes data from three other spectral libraries: the Johns Hopkins University (JHU) Spectral Library the Jet Propulsion Laboratory(JPL) Spectral Library, and the United States Geological Survey (USGS - Reston) Spectral Library.
